aboutme.c1_text: Hello there! My name is Aleksandr Mladich. I am a Front-End Developer with a passion for creating captivating web apps and a strong understanding of web development principles and user centered design. I have a degree in industrial and product design, which gives me a unique perspective on how to design and develop user friendly interfaces and components.

contacts.title: My socials:
contacts.text: Belgrade, Serbia [UTC+1]. You can contact me anytime that is comfortable for you but do not expect an immediate response.
